name: Bombini
description:
Bombini is a short game about bees trying to survive, collect pollen, sustain your hive, and watch out for spiders!



Features
  • 5-20 minutes of playtime.
  • Collect pollen and create new bees.
  • Move your way around dangerous spiders.
  • A cute small world.



Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
